text: The Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone is the first large canyon on the Yellowstone River below Yellowstone Falls in Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming. The canyon is about long, between deep and from wide.NPS:Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone ==Important canyon landmarks== * Agate Creek * Artist Point * Calcite Spring * Cascade Creek * Inspiration Point * Grand View * Lookout Point * Overhanging Cliff * Point Sublime * Seven Mile Hole * Silver Cord Cascade ==Notes== ==References== Category:Canyons Category:Geography of Wyoming
title: Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone
